subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Leandro Barbosa, Raja Bell and Shawn Marion led eight players in double figures with 16 points apiece as the visiting Phoenix Suns continued their dominance of the Eastern Conference with a 115-83 win over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
snippet: Leandro Barbosa, Raja Bell and Shawn Marion led eight players in double figures with 16 points apiece as the visiting Phoenix Suns continued their dominance of the Eastern Conference with a 115-83 win over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
